data.title: Reminder: recertification for Closed-Loop Extraction System coming up
data.excerpt: New rules were approved in the November 2022 regulations that require operators of closed-loop extraction systems to have their systems recertified by a California-licensed engineer at least once every five years. If you operate a closed-loop extraction system, get re-certified!
